attributes.comment:
Please, please do not increase the cost of the 797C application for adoptive
families! This cost has been increased significantly over the last several years,
and we are now facing yet another substantial rate increase by this office. This
cost is already a burden for adoptive parents. Many families are adopting from
China and now have to go through this process twice due to the wait times, so
that this increase in reality is two-fold of what is proposed. Families are already
stretched to the limit financially by the process of adoption, and must now face
the increase of fees by our own government, yet again.

It certainly appears that fees for other paperwork processing at USCIS have not
risen the same amount as those from adoptive parents. To us it feels as if we are
being penalized for adopting by having to fund other programs at USCIS with our
fees. Our taxes already support those services- we are paying for processing of
our paperwork for adoption.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Amy J. Newmeyer
